channel.title: School Health on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in School Health on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: communication is KEY
item.description: Well. everythin gis better. We talked and I fessed up to my crimes. We figured out what and how to make things better. How to make things more healthy for the best of us and why it happened. It is good. I am sad however.. because she is leaving for school again. I will see her soon.. however, now it is time for a hobby.. maybe working out?
